description: Make this creamy and delicious vegan chocolate pudding in just 5 minutes! Only 8 ingredients!
keywords: raw chocolate pudding, vegan chocolate avocado pudding, vegan chocolate pudding
name: Raw Vegan Chocolate Espresso Pudding
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup coconut milk (canned full fat works best, add the thick solid part, not the watery milk.)
2 to 4 medjool dates (pitted and soaked in water until theyâ€™re soft)
3 tablespoon pure maple syrup (add more if you like it sweeter)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the avocados in half and remove the pits. Scoop the avocado flesh into a high-powered blender or a food processor. Add the 1/4 cup cocoa powder, 1/4 cup coconut milk, the soaked medjool dates, 3 tbsp maple syrup, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, 1/4 tsp cinnamon, and 1/8 tsp salt and process until there are no visible pieces of avocado or dates. It should be whipped to a thick and creamy texture.
Top with your favorite topping if desired.
